title: Bachelorette fans go wild over 'DRUNK' Timm Hanly at the cocktail party
text:
There were bust-ups and bombshells during Wednesday night's episode of The Bachelorette.

But perhaps the most alarming thing about the cocktail party was the amount of alcohol Timm Hanly had seemingly consumed.

Fans flocked to Twitter to accuse the 27-year-old fireproofer of being so drunk he could 'barely stand up'.

'He can barely stand!' Bachelorette fans took to Twitter on Wednesday to accuse Timm Hanly (pictured) of being 'drunk' at the cocktail party

At one stage, Timm dramatically told everyone that Angie Kent had 'taken back' Carlin Sterritt's rose, after she'd previously given him one earlier in the episode.

'She took his f**king rose back! I swear she took his f**king rose back!' Timm yelled, before realising moments later he'd made a mistake and Carlin still had his rose.

In response to his bizarre behaviour, one viewer tweeted: 'Lmao Timm is so drunk!' Another wrote: 'Timm is so drunk he can barely stand!'

'She took his f**king rose back!' At one stage, Timm dramatically told everyone that Angie Kent had 'taken back' Carlin Sterritt's rose, before realising he had made a mistake

A few too many? In response to Timm's bizarre behaviour, fans tweeted that he 'looked drunk'

Meanwhile, Timm's loose behaviour didn't go unnoticed by the rest of the house.

At one stage, Ryan Anderson furiously said: 'Timm, if you're stirring s**t, man, I don't appreciate it right now.'

Waving a glass of red wine, the long-haired larrikin slurred in response: 'Everyone comes down at me... he has a couple of big weeks stirring a couple of pots...'

Losing patience: Timm's loose behaviour didn't go unnoticed by the rest of the house, with Ryan Anderson (pictured) scolding him for 'stirring s**t' in the mansion

Even Timm's friend, Ciarran Stott, began to get frustrated with his behaviour, saying: 'Are you taking the f**king p**s? Has [Carlin] got a rose on his chest or what?'

As Timm tried to defend himself, an angry Ciarran shouted: 'You're a f**king idiot. I'm done, I'm over it. Get me out of here!'

The Bachelorette continues Thursday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: There were bust-ups and bombshells during Wednesday night's episode of The Bachelorette.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
